channel.title: Pi got a prob with my shops? its mock pro:d
channel.description:
HEY GUYS, WAS FOLLOING A TUT AND THIS IS WHAT I HAVE SO FAR.. [code=java5]case 1552: c.getShops().openShop(150); break;[/code]
in shops.cfg i have [code=javascript]shop = 150 santa_baby 2 2 1038 2000 1040 2000 1042 2000 1044 2000 1046 2000 1048 2000 1050 2000 1053 2000 1055 2000 1057 2000 11694 2000 [/code] and of course spawn-config [code=html4strict]spawn = 1552 3093 3493 0 0 0 0 0 Santa Clause[/code] and i compile says its okay and i open up run.bat and i get this http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l554/mockpro/shopsprob.jpg thanks guys ~~person thats got swag~~~(mockpro) :D come on guys!! wheres the help? ;p

item.title: Pi got a prob with my shops? its mock pro:d
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

tyb97:

You can’t have over shop id 99… maybe its… 105… something like that.

Most of the servers allocate the shops max amount based on how many loaded from the configuration.This seems like the user tried to access a slot outside the max size.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi got a prob with my shops? its mock pro:d
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Please revert to your previous shop setting you posted. I’m pretty sure that where you have 150, It should be the next shop number. IE: you have 7 shops, The next would be 8.
